about_the_game:
A wide-spread virus blankets the Earth and gives rise to rogue AI called Mad Mechs - autonomous vehicles hellbent on destroying humanity. As the only known AI network unaffected by the virus, your task is to hunt and eliminate the rogue AI.

Key Features:

  • Customize Your Mech: Build your combat vehicle from over 700 components including weapons, augments, support drones, special abilities and more.

  • Progression Choices: Choose your path, level up your vehicle, unlock powerful new abilities, and upgrade your weapons to become a force to be reckoned with. Equip powerful augments by activating Augment Spires.

  • Destructible Physics & Interactivity: Physics-driven impacts allow for realistic destruction and interaction with vehicles and the environment.

  • Dynamic Environments: Each map features changing seasons, weather patterns, and other environmental effects that alter terrain and combat conditions.

  • Boss Battles: Face off against towering bosses that test your reflexes and strategy.

Prepare for intense battles, endless customization, and a world that’s as unpredictable as your enemies. Will you restore the humanity that was once swept away by chaos? Wishlist MAD MECHS now and be the first to experience the action!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580 - DirectX 12.0 compatible system or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
